channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Celsius creditors allege Wintermute facilitated 'wash trading': Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: It was alleged that Celsius executives engaged Wintermute to aid "wash trading" in an effort to “fraudulently" manipulate trading volumes on the Celsius platform.

item.title: ECB official labels crypto as 'deleterious' with 'no societal benefits' in scathing speech
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Fabio Panetta, the volatility of crypto and aspects of blockchain technology made digital assets only suitable for gambling.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: is the Bitcoin bear market over
item.description: Bitcoin price hits a year-to-date high as investors’ excitement over BlackRock and Fidelity Investments applying for spot BTC ETFs fuels dreams of a new bull market.

item.title: Crypto Biz: The race for a Bitcoin spot ETF, Wall Street’s new crypto exchange, and other news
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The bid for the first Bitcoin (BTC) spot exchange-traded fund (ETF) in the United States is gaining traction following BlackRock’s recent application.

item.title: Wirex may suffer card outage in EEA due to UAB PayrNet licensing issue
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Wirex cards may stop working in the European Economic Area, but funds held in the account are safe, the company said.

item.title: Etherscan launches AI-powered Code Reader: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens broke out of a three-week-long bearish momentum amid a marketwide surge led by Bitcoin.

item.title: Volatility Shares Trust aims for listing of leveraged Bitcoin futures ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The debut of shares for the Bitcoin investment vehicle is potentially set for June 27, but the U.S. SEC has a pattern of denying many crypto-linked ETF applications.

item.title: Bitcoin price data suggests bulls will succeed in holding $30K as support this time
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Two key Bitcoin price metrics suggest that bulls will be able to hold the $30,000 level as support.

item.title: Judge blocks Bankman-Fried’s attempt to obtain key documents in fraud prosecution: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The request was denied by U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan, who characterized it as a “fishing expedition” lacking justification.

item.title: Sequoia partner says investing in FTX was the right move: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Sequoia’s Alfred Lin stood up for the firm’s $213.5 million investment in the now-bankrupt crypto exchange FTX.

item.title: Pepecoin (PEPE) vs. Dogecoin (DOGE): Is a flippening on the horizon?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: PEPE quietly pulled off a 100% rally earlier this week, raising questions on whether the frog-themed memecoin will become a serious Dogecoin competitor.

item.title: Price analysis 6/23: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin price looks ready to turn $31,000 to support, and many altcoins are following with double-digit gains.

item.title: Belgian financial regulator orders Binance to cease all virtual currency services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The regulator said Binance must cease “with immediate effect” all crypto-related services in Belgium after being unable to provide sufficient information on its non-EEA companies.

item.title: SEC waives BlockFi’s $30M fine until creditors are paid
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The U.S. SEC was at the top of BlockFi creditor’s list with a $30-million settlement balance from February 2022.

item.title: Robust crypto fundamentals pull through after May’s monthly red candle: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Research
item.description: What are the current trends in VC investment in the crypto sector, and when will the bear market finally end?

item.title: US Supreme Court halts Coinbase cases in its first crypto ruling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The United States Supreme Court ruled in favor of Coinbase in its first-ever opinion on a cryptocurrency case on June 23.

item.title: Circle and Sequoia were among top depositors at Silicon Valley Bank: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to a Bloomberg report, other major depositors included Silicon Valley Bank, SVB Financial Group, biotechnology research company Altos Labs and China-based firm Kanzhun.

item.title: Bitcoin volatility takes a break as $31K BTC price yearly highs loom
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A serious watershed is on the horizon for BTC’s price, as Bitcoin shorters show signs of betting on a short-term trend turnaround.

item.title: Rising institutional interest is a ‘bullish’ sign for crypto: SEBA Bank exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: SEBA Bank exec Nasha Afshar believes that the question of institutions getting into crypto has shifted from “if” to “when,“ indicating growing confidence in the industry.

item.title: Crypto City guide to Sydney: More than just a ‘token’ bridge
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A “full-on” crypto scene and “heaps” of Web3 projects in Australia’s largest city show Sydney has more to offer than beaches and a bridge.

item.title: Honk if you love Bitcoin! Lightning takes the wheel of a European rally car adventure
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: With a comically loud horn, a candy machine and a jukebox filled with Mozart, metal and more, it’s the “Bitcoin Ambassadors” rally car adventure.

item.title: Crypto scammers and the need for tools to prevent theft: World Token Summit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Matthias Mende said while it’s very unfortunate, there are a lot of bad actors using social media who are constantly trying to bring harm to others.

item.title: Bitcoin mining heats water in Brooklyn Bathhouse, users flip out
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The impact of Bitcoin mining on the environment remains a significant concern to many, leading to unfavorable responses from people opposed to its use.

item.title: JPMorgan bank deploys JPM Coin for euro-denominated payments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: German conglomerate Siemens was reportedly the first company to process euro-denominated payments using JPM Coin.

item.title: Crypto.com receives regulatory approval to offer crypto services in Spain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The latest regulatory approval for the crypto exchange comes within weeks of acquiring a major payment institution license from regulators in Singapore.

item.title: Binance faces scrutiny in Brazil, exec summoned to testify before Congress
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: This development comes amid a global regulatory crackdown on Binance, which is facing investigations in multiple countries.

item.title: Casa launches multisignature Ethereum self-custody vault
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Casa has added Ethereum support to its self-custody storage solutions, providing multisignature security for BTC and ETH.

item.title: Winklevoss twins’ Gemini launches Ethereum staking in the UK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Gemini Staking Pro allows institutions in the U.K. to become Ethereum validators by locking up at least 32 ETH, worth about $60,000 at the time of writing.

item.title: BRICS: History, objectives and an overview of the global alliance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore how the emerging economies of Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa cooperate in areas such as economics, development and global governance.

item.title: Forensic analysis can benefit from tokenization: World Token Summit panel
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: RAK DAO’s Meng Chan Shu encouraged community members to “keep on building” despite the challenges in adopting tokenization.
